sentences.english: Mailijian Mattress advances for the present ages, and benefits for future.

sentences.english: The company will be regarded as the rule of Huangdi future generations, peace and prosperity.

sentences.english: No king rules forever my son.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪个国王可以千秋万载，儿子。

sentences.english: Actually, both means of recording possess their respective advantages which are beneficial to us.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，两种记录方式各有千秋。

sentences.english: A grand Qianqiu banquet was held in the royal palace.
sentences.chinese: 皇宫里还要举行盛大的千秋宴会。

sentences.english: To maintain and develop the overall friendly relations between China and Pakistan will benefit not only our present generations but also future generations.
sentences.chinese: 维护和发展好中巴全面友好关系功在当代，利在千秋。

sentences.english: The story started from the Qianqiu festival at that time.
sentences.chinese: 这还要从当时的千秋节说起。

sentences.english: The great achievements of revolutionary heroes inspire us to move forward forever.
sentences.chinese: 炳千秋的光辉业绩激励我们不断向前。

sentences.english: This shows that discipline class adviser's work is "working in the contemporary era and Benefit future generations."

sentences.english: Witn my best wishes for your future happiness.
Qianqiu mirror refers namely to bronze mirror.
With the already prepared Qianqiu mirror in their hand, all the state ministers were required of presenting the mirrors to Emperor Xuanzong.
sentences.chinese: 群臣们个个手捧早已准备好的千秋镜敬献给唐玄宗。

sentences.english: Only fools believe that a piece of paper can only protect generations to come.
sentences.chinese: 只有傻子才相信一张纸能保千秋万代。

sentences.english: The world cultural heritages of Europe spread all over the place and have their characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲世界文化遗产星罗棋布，各有千秋。

definition: for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
the sun and moon/day and month/every day and every month/season/life and livelihood
